教育費: (きょういくひ) - education or school expenses
教育長: (きょういくちょう) - superintendent of education
教訓を垂れる: (きょうくんをたれる) - to lecture; to give a lesson
教誡: (きょうかい) - (教誨, 教戒 only) counselling (often of imprisoned criminals by a chaplain, etc.)/giving guidance; (教戒, 教誡 only) admonishment/scolding/exhortation
教誨: (きょうかい) - (教誨, 教戒 only) counselling (often of imprisoned criminals by a chaplain, etc.)/giving guidance; (教戒, 教誡 only) admonishment/scolding/exhortation

教護院: (きょうごいん) - reform school; juvenile reformatory
教部省: (きょうぶしょう) - Ministry of Religious Education (1872-1877)
教門: (きょうもん) - study of Buddhist theory
教鞭: (きょうべん) - teacher's cane; teacher's pointer
教鞭をとる: (きょうべんをとる) - to teach; to take a teaching job
教鞭を取る: (きょうべんをとる) - to teach; to take a teaching job
教鞭を執る: (きょうべんをとる) - to teach; to take a teaching job
教頭: (きょうとう) - deputy head teacher; vice principal
教頭先生: (きょうとうせんせい) - vice principal
教養人: (きょうようじん) - person of culture; educated person; highbrow
教養学部: (きょうようがくぶ) - college of general education
教養小説: (きょうようしょうせつ) - (yoji) novel about one's education, spiritual growth, etc.; Bildungsroman
教養番組: (きょうようばんぐみ) - educational program (TV, radio)
教養課程: (きょうようかてい) - general education course
教養部: (きょうようぶ) - college of liberal arts (general education); liberal arts school
敢えて: (aete) - purposely (de algo desnecessário, inesperado ou aparentemente contraproducente, etc.), daringly (doing something), deliberately, intentionally; not necessarily, not particularly, not especially
敢て: (あえて) - purposely (of something needless, unexpected or seemingly counterproductive, etc.)/daringly (doing something)/deliberately/intentionally; (used with neg. verb) not necessarily/not particularly/not especially; (used with neg. verb) definitely not
敢死: (かんし) - preparing for death; preparedness for death
敢行: (kankou) - ação decisiva, seguir adiante com, ousar fazer, realizar
敢闘賞: (かんとうしょう) - {sumo}  Fighting Spirit Prize
散: (san/chi) - scatter , loose articles (not packaged with other things), bulk items, individual items
散々: (さんざん) - thoroughly/completely/utterly; severely/harshly/terribly/miserably/wretchedly/badly; scattered/disconnected/dispersed/smashed into tiny pieces
散ける: (ばらける) - to come apart; to unravel; to come loose; to become disarrayed (e.g. hair)
散じる: (さんじる) - to scatter/to disperse; to spend on/to squander (e.g. one's fortune); to chase away (e.g. one's worries)/to kill (pain)
散ずる: (さんずる) - to scatter/to disperse; to spend on/to squander (e.g. one's fortune); to chase away (e.g. one's worries)/to kill (pain)
散らかす: (ちらかす) - to scatter around; to leave untidy
散らかった紙屑: (ちらかったかみくず) - scattered (littered) paper scraps
散らかる: (ちらかる) - to be in disorder; to lie scattered around
散らし: (チラシ) - scattering; (esp. チラシ) leaflets; sushi rice in a box or bowl with a variety of ingredients sprinkled on top; writing in an irregular hand
散らしずし: (ちらしずし) - sushi rice in a box or bowl with a variety of ingredients sprinkled on top
散らし寿司: (ちらしずし) - sushi rice in a box or bowl with a variety of ingredients sprinkled on top
散らし書き: (ちらしがき) - writing in an irregular hand
散らし模様: (ちらしもよう) - scattered pattern; irregular pattern
散らし鮨: (ちらしずし) - sushi rice in a box or bowl with a variety of ingredients sprinkled on top
散らす: (ちらす) - to scatter/to cause a shower of; to disperse/to distribute/to spread; to resolve (a symptom, condition, etc.)/to relieve/to get rid of/to cure; (as 気を散らす, etc.)  to distract/to divert; (after the -masu stem of a verb) to do ... wildly (i.e. disorderly or frequently)/to do ... all over the place
散らばら: (ちらばら) - here and there/scattered about; to be scattered around
散らばる: (ちらばる) - to be scattered about
散りしく: (ちりしく) - to lie scattered; to be strewn about
散りばめる: (ちりばめる) - to inlay; to set; to stud (e.g. star-studded sky); to enchase (a thing) with; to mount (gem)
散り乱れる: (ちりみだれる) - to be scattered around; to lie scattered
散り始める: (ちりはじめる) - to begin falling (e.g. leaves, petals, etc.)
散り嵌める: (ちりばめる) - to inlay; to set; to stud (e.g. star-studded sky); to enchase (a thing) with; to mount (gem)
散り敷く: (ちりしく) - to lie scattered; to be strewn about
散り残る: (ちりのこる) - to be left blooming; to remain on the stem
散り蓮華: (ちりれんげ) - ceramic spoon; fallen lotus petal
散る: (ちる) - to fall (e.g. blossoms, leaves); to scatter/to be dispersed; to disappear/to dissolve/to break up; to spread/to run/to blur; to die a noble death
散乱: (さんらん) - dispersion; scattering; spreading out; diffusion
散乱反射: (さんらんはんしゃ) - scatter reflections
散乱日射量: (さんらんにっしゃりょう) - diffuse solar radiation
散佚: (さんいつ) - being scattered and ultimately lost; dissipation
散光星雲: (さんこうせいうん) - diffuse nebula
散兵線: (さんぺいせん) - front line of (trenches for) deployed soldiers
散在: (さんざい) - to be scattered; to straggle; to be found here and there
散在神経系: (さんざいしんけいけい) - diffuse nervous system
散布図: (さんぷず) - scatter diagram; scatterplot; scatter plot; scattergraph; scattergram
散布量: (さんぷりょう) - irrelevance; prevarication; spread
散形花序: (さんけいかじょ) - umbellate inflorescence; umbel (i.e. flower with a large number of flowers growing radially from a common center)
